channel.title: SkyLearn RSS Test B â€“ Property + Tech Mixed Feed
channel.description: Feed combining commercial property updates with major tech headlines

item.title: Meta signs new London lease at King's Cross for AI research unit
item.description: The social media giant has taken 90,000 sq ft in King's Cross to house its European AI operations team.

item.title: British Land refurbishes Broadgate retail space for flexible use
item.description: The upgrade aims to attract hybrid tenants and improve sustainability credentials under BREEAM Excellent standards.

item.title: Google launches Gemini 3 to challenge OpenAI's latest release
item.description: Alphabet's latest model introduces new multimodal capabilities and tighter data governance controls.

item.title: Amazon opens new data centre campus in Dublin
item.description: Amazon Web Services expands its European footprint with three new facilities supporting low-latency workloads.
